radiographic_examinations.findings: Small left-sided pleural effusion and minimal prominence of the left pulmonary artery.

radiographic_examinations.date: Three days after the chest radiograph
radiographic_examinations.findings: No perfusion of the left lung; minimal decrease in ventilation of the left lung and normal ventilation of the right.
Large mass that fills the main pulmonary artery and extends into the left pulmonary artery and the intra-pericardial portion of the right pulmonary artery.
Intraluminal mass occluding the left pulmonary artery and involving the main and proximal right pulmonary arteries.
